price: Sebagai sunah Allah yang berlaku atas orang-orang yang telah terdahulu sebelum(mu) dan kamu sekali-kali tiada akan mendapati perubahan pada sunah Allah.
arabic: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِي ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: sunnata al-lahi fī alladhīna khalaw min qablu walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdīlan
